name: Drunkn Bar Fight
description: VR PARTY GAMEDrunkn Bar Fight is a simple, immersive, silly, rowdy party game. The only limits to the mayhem is your imagination and your moral decency.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 - 64 bit Processor: i5 3.3 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 10 - 64 bit Processor: i7 3.4Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
